head.title: C# .NET Document Merging API | Combine & Split PDF Word Excel EPUB
head.description: C# .NET document merging API to combine, split, swap or remove document pages from PDF, Microsoft Word, Excel, presentations, Visio and image formats.

header.title: .NET API to Merge & Split Documents
header.description: API to Combine, Split, Swap, Trim or Remove Documents, Slides and Diagrams in .NET Applications.

content.paragraph_1: GroupDocs.Merger for .NET, assists you to rapidly develop top-class business applications in C#, ASP.NET and other .NET technologies. Just a few lines of code will enable your .NET applications to combine, split, rearrange, swap, trim and remove single page or a collection of document pages, slides, images or diagrams. Perform these operations on secure files by setting or removing password protection of known and unknown file formats.
content.paragraph_2: By using GroupDocs.Merger for .NET, you can perform merging; splitting and other related operations on single documents as well as a batch of documents. Programmatically stitch files of all popular formats, such as Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Visio, OpenDocument, PDF, XPS, TXT, CSV, eBook and image file formats.

tab_one.description: Following is an overview of GroupDocs.Merger for .NET:

content.line_4: Swap or shuffle any two pages

tab_two.description: GroupDocs.Merger for .NET supports merging the following [document file formats](https://docs.groupdocs.com/merger/net/supported-document-formats/):

content.line_1: **Word:** DOC, DOCX, DOCM, DOT, DOTX, DOTM, RTF, TXT
content.line_2: **Excel:** XLS, XLSX, XLSM, XLSB, XLTM, XLT, XLTM, XLTX, XLAM, SXC, SpreadsheetML
content.line_3: **PowerPoint:** PPT, PPTX, PPS, PPSX, PPSM, POT, POTM, POTX, PPTM

content.line_1: **OpenDocument Formats**: ODT, OTT, ODP, OTP, ODS

tab_three.description: GroupDocs.Merger for .NET supports following Operating Systems, Frameworks & Package Managers:

feature_1.content: Combine & merge multiple pages, slides & diagrams into a single document

feature_2.content: Split and break large documents into multiple smaller files

feature_3.content: Rearrange, shuffle and reorganize pages, slides or diagrams

feature_4.content: Swap and exchange two pages, slides or diagrams with each other within a document

feature_5.content: Trim document by removing specific pages, slides or diagrams

feature_6.content: Remove single or collection of pages, slides or diagrams

feature_7.content: Stitch together large number of documents in batches

feature_8.content: Programmatically check if a document is secured with password

feature_9.content: Set, reset and remove password of known and unknown document formats

feature_10.content: Fetch list of supported file formats â€“ Split and Join Text (ERR) Log File Format

feature_11.content: Rotate pages and change page orientation of known & unknown formats

feature_12.content: Combine multiple files of different formats to DOC, DOCX & XPS

feature_13.content: Splitting large text files by line numbers

feature_14.content: Obtain image representations of document pages and diagram family formats

feature_15.content: Join Images with Background Color for Empty Black Image Space

feature_16.content: Merge Different Types of Documents (DOC, XLS, PPT etc) into A Single PDF File

feature_17.content: Easily Import OLE Objects into Microsoft Word, Excel, Presentation and OpenDocument File Types

feature_18.content: Add Other Documents to Diagram Page via OLE Objects

feature_1.title: Remove Desired Pages from Documents
feature_1.content: GroupDocs.Merger for .NET API helps you delete unwanted pages from your document.

feature_2.title: Apply Transformation to Rendered Output
feature_2.content: You can perform various transformations to the rendered output document using GroupDocs.Merger for .NET API. These transformation options give you control on the way you present the rendered output for display. The available transformations are, page rotation option, page reorder option and applying text watermark.

feature_3.title: Check Password of Unknown Document Format
feature_3.content: GroupDocs.Merger for .NET API enables you to check password of a document whose format is not known.

solutions.title: GroupDocs.Merger offers document merging APIs for other popular development environments
